Boar-12 is a relatively new development from the factory "Hammer" (Vyatskie field) and was created as a direct competitor is very popular in Russia guns Sayga-12S/12K series. The basis of the gun Boar-12 is the time-tested design of the RPK machinegune(also produced at the factory hammer). The main purpose of the Boar-12 is as a sport weapon(practice fire by the rules of IPSC), as well as defense and home security activity. The Boar-12 is a good weapon for law enforcement agents.

 The UMP "Taktikal" is a blowback-operated , magazine-fed submachine gun with integrated silencer and eotech scope, firing from a closed bolt. As originally designed, the UMP is chambered for larger cartridges and magazines than other submachine guns like the MP5, to provide more stopping power against unarmored targets (with a slightly lower effective range) than the 9x19mm MP5 provides. A larger cartridge produces more recoil, and makes control more difficult in fully automatic firing. To mitigate this, is equiped with larger magazine. the cyclic rate of fire was improved to 700 rounds/min (600 rounds/min for the UMP45).

POSP 3-9x42V relates to an optical sight, which can be used in the dark with built-in backlight. The design of this model provides for adjustment of lateral and angular corrections using flywheels. The alternating increase and rangefinder modernized grid allows POSP 3-9x42V easily determine the distance to the object under observation. Tightness is ensured by the sight of nitrogen, which is filled with the internal part of the body, it also prevents the formation of moisture on the lenses inside, and possible corrosion of metal components.
